content: and turn 2 sts row 2 increase in the 1st st 1 single_crochet in the next st chain 1 and tutn 3 sts from row 3 to 6 1 single_crochet in each st across chain 1 and turn 3 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for attaching arm to body repeat row 1 through 6 working into the hole on the opposite side of the tag weave in the short tails from the beginning row use the longer tails to sew the arms to the side of the body so that the tag is held in the front of the potato weave in the ends about the author pattern created with love by munchi8175
